"So you're here too, <%me>?": "What are you up to, Manon?"
"Looking for something?"
"I've been investigating the enemies here in Resol Forest."
"No, I've been studying the enemies here in Resol Forest."
"Particularly regarding the how DOLLS here manage themselves."
"At first glance, the DOLLS appear to move in a largely disorganized fashion..."
"They can also seem to move all at once as a group, as if by way of some sort of collective consciousness."
"Do you know what I'm talking about? The type of DOLLS referred to as Overseers."
"A perfect example would be the Pedas Vera."
"Overseer-type DOLLS quite literally control how other DOLLS behave."
"In other words, like a DOLLS commander."
"The Nex Aelio that appeared here in Resol Forest is a particularly powerful one among them."
"In the database, it's classified under something called Archon-type DOLLS."
"When we lost contact with Bruder that day, Nex Aelio had been giving orders to DOLLS all across Aelio."
"The DOLLS who received those commands turned to Central City and started marching towards it."
"Had the de-facto command center, Nex Aelio, not been dealt with, it would have surely been an awful day for Central City."
"It was a great thing that we're able to field a such a counteroffensive so quickly."
"I can only hope that our success was more than a just a fluke."
"Though most of what I said is just me repeating the contents of the report I received from Crawford."
"He does really magnificent research."
"Things are only just getting started, it seems..."
"This may be a bit much to take in all of a sudden."
"Hehehe. Well, let's leave today's lecture at that then, shall we?"
"If I learn anything more, I'll let you know."
